overview: Pete spends his typical morning patrolling a park, teaching himself how to whistle to pass the time. Pete's day takes a turn when he decides he needs a donut. Inside a local donut shop he's mistaken for a police officer and hesitantly basks in the misplaced glory. When suddenly two armed men burst in, guns flashing. As tension mounts, the whole donut shop looks to Pete to save them. Terror will reign. Love will be tested. And one person will rise from the dust a donut shop hero.
tagline: A room full of hostages will look to a security guard who looks like a cop to save them... Terror will reign. Love will be tested. And one man will rise, a donut shop hero.
title: Donut Shop Hero
